quote: Their blissfully soft texture calmed me but alerted me at the same time. I couldn't explain the gentle spark of light that dripped off the edges. And of course, the aqua trim felt way too familiar.
quote_letters: THEIR BLISSFULLY SOFT TEXTURE CALMED ME BUT ALERTED ME AT THE SAME TIME I COULDNT EXPLAIN THE GENTLE SPARK OF LIGHT THAT DRIPPED OFF THE EDGES AND OF COURSE THE AQUA TRIM FELT WAY TOO FAMILIAR
